title: Tiny Hands Make Everything Funny - Awesome Stuff Week: Unwrapped!
description:
Go check out http://www.YouTube.com/AwesomeStuffWeek for way more awesome stuff! YouTube doesn’t care if you’ve been naughty or nice -- you still deserve a shot at the greatest
gifts this holiday season.


Get everything early here: http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy



Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino




* This video is Shoppable, but is currently only accessible when viewing YouTube from a desktop browser.
* This video does not imply any endorsement of the product by Google or YouTube. The views expressed here solely belong to Kinda Funny.
